duas.title: Dua for Entering the Mosque
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ افْتَحْ لِي أَبْوَابَ رَحْمَتِكَ
duas.transliteration: Allahumma aftah li abwaba rahmatik
duas.translation: O Allah, open the gates of Your mercy for me

duas.title: Dua for Leaving the Mosque
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ مِنْ فَضْلِكَ
duas.transliteration: Allahumma inni as'aluka min fadlik
duas.translation: O Allah, I ask You of Your bounty

duas.title: Dua for Entering the Home
duas.arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ وَلَجْنَا، وَبِسْمِ اللَّهِ خَرَجْنَا، وَعَلَى اللَّهِ رَبِّنَا تَوَكَّلْنَا
duas.transliteration: Bismillahi walajna, wa bismillahi kharajna, wa 'ala Allahi rabbina tawakkalna
duas.translation: In the name of Allah we enter, in the name of Allah we leave, and upon our Lord we place our trust

duas.title: Dua for Leaving the Home
duas.arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ تَوَكَّلْتُ عَلَى اللَّهِ، وَلَا حَوْلَ وَلَا قُوَّةَ إِلَّا بِاللَّهِ
duas.transliteration: Bismillahi tawakkaltu 'alallah, wa la hawla wa la quwwata illa billah
duas.translation: In the name of Allah, I place my trust in Allah, and there is no might nor power except with Allah

duas.title: Dua for Entering the Market
duas.arabic: لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ وَحْدَهُ لَا شَرِيكَ لَهُ، لَهُ الْمُلْكُ وَلَهُ الْحَمْدُ، يُحْيِي وَيُمِيتُ، وَهُوَ حَيٌّ لَا يَمُوتُ، بِيَدِهِ الْخَيْرُ، وَهُوَ عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ
duas.transliteration: La ilaha illallah wahdahu la shareeka lah, lahul mulku wa lahul hamd, yuhyi wa yumeet, wa huwa hayyun la yamoot, biyadihil khair, wa huwa 'ala kulli shay'in qadeer
duas.translation: There is none worthy of worship except Allah, alone, without partner, to Him belongs all sovereignty and praise, He gives life and causes death, and He is living and does not die, in His hand is all good, and He is over all things competent

duas.title: Dua for Entering the Bathroom
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْخُبُثِ وَالْخَبَائِثِ
duas.transliteration: Allahumma inni a'oodhu bika minal khubuthi wal khaba'ith
duas.translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from evil and evil-doers

duas.title: Dua for Leaving the Bathroom
duas.arabic: غُفْرَانَكَ
duas.transliteration: Ghufranak
duas.translation: I seek Your forgiveness

duas.title: Dua for Entering the Masjid
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ افْتَحْ لِي أَبْوَابَ رَحْمَتِكَ
duas.transliteration: Allahumma aftah li abwaba rahmatik
duas.translation: O Allah, open the gates of Your mercy for me

duas.title: Dua for Leaving the Masjid
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ مِنْ فَضْلِكَ
duas.transliteration: Allahumma inni as'aluka min fadlik
duas.translation: O Allah, I ask You of Your bounty

duas.title: Dua for Entering the Home
duas.arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ وَلَجْنَا، وَبِسْمِ اللَّهِ خَرَجْنَا، وَعَلَى اللَّهِ رَبِّنَا تَوَكَّلْنَا
duas.transliteration: Bismillahi walajna, wa bismillahi kharajna, wa 'ala Allahi rabbina tawakkalna
duas.translation: In the name of Allah we enter, in the name of Allah we leave, and upon our Lord we place our trust

duas.title: Dua for Seeking Knowledge
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ انْفَعْنِي بِمَا عَلَّمْتَنِي، وَعَلِّمْنِي مَا يَنْفَعُنِي، وَزِدْنِي عِلْمًا
duas.transliteration: Allahummanfa'ni bima 'allamtani, wa 'allimni ma yanfa'ni, wa zidni 'ilma
duas.translation: O Allah, benefit me with what You have taught me, teach me what will benefit me, and increase me in knowledge

duas.title: Dua for Studying
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ لَا سَهْلَ إِلَّا مَا جَعَلْتَهُ سَهْلًا، وَأَنْتَ تَجْعَلُ الْحَزْنَ إِذَا شِئْتَ سَهْلًا
duas.transliteration: Allahumma la sahla illa ma ja'altahu sahlan, wa anta taj'alul hazna idha shi'ta sahlan
duas.translation: O Allah, nothing is easy except what You make easy, and You make the difficult easy if You wish

duas.title: Dua for Understanding
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ فَقِّهْنِي فِي الدِّينِ
duas.transliteration: Allahumma faqqihni fid deen
duas.translation: O Allah, make me understand the religion

duas.title: Dua for Memorization
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ حُبَّكَ، وَحُبَّ مَنْ يُحِبُّكَ، وَحُبَّ عَمَلٍ يُقَرِّبُنِي إِلَى حُبِّكَ
duas.transliteration: Allahumma inni as'aluka hubbaka, wa hubba man yuhibbuka, wa hubba 'amalin yuqarribuni ila hubbika
duas.translation: O Allah, I ask You for Your love, the love of those who love You, and the love of deeds that will bring me closer to Your love

duas.title: Dua for Teaching
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ عَلِّمْنِي مَا يَنْفَعُنِي، وَانْفَعْنِي بِمَا عَلَّمْتَنِي، وَزِدْنِي عِلْمًا
duas.transliteration: Allahumma 'allimni ma yanfa'ni, wanfa'ni bima 'allamtani, wa zidni 'ilma
duas.translation: O Allah, teach me what benefits me, benefit me with what You have taught me, and increase me in knowledge

duas.title: Dua for Travel
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنَّا نَسْأَلُكَ فِي سَفَرِنَا هَذَا الْبِرَّ وَالتَّقْوَى، وَمِنَ الْعَمَلِ مَا تَرْضَى، اللَّهُمَّ هَوِّنْ عَلَيْنَا سَفَرَنَا هَذَا وَاطْوِ عَنَّا بُعْدَهُ
duas.transliteration: Allahumma inna nas'aluka fi safarina hadha al-birra wat-taqwa, wa minal 'amali ma tardha, Allahumma hawwin 'alayna safarana hadha watwi 'anna bu'dahu
duas.translation: O Allah, we ask You on this journey of ours for righteousness and piety, and for deeds that are pleasing to You. O Allah, make this journey easy for us and fold up for us its distance

duas.title: Dua for Boarding a Vehicle
duas.arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ
duas.transliteration: Bismillah
duas.translation: In the name of Allah

duas.title: Dua for Entering a City
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ بَارِكْ لَنَا فِيهَا، اللَّهُمَّ ارْزُقْنَا جَلَابِيبَهَا، وَحُبَّبْنَا إِلَى أَهْلِهَا، وَحَبِّبْ صَالِحِي أَهْلِهَا إِلَيْنَا
duas.transliteration: Allahumma barik lana fiha, Allahummarzuqna jalabibaha, wa habbibna ila ahliha, wa habbib salihi ahliha ilayna
duas.translation: O Allah, bless us in it. O Allah, grant us its provisions, make us beloved to its people, and make the righteous of its people beloved to us

duas.title: Dua for Returning from Travel
duas.arabic: آيِبُونَ، تَائِبُونَ، عَابِدُونَ، لِرَبِّنَا حَامِدُونَ
duas.transliteration: Ayibuna, ta'ibuna, 'abiduna, li rabbina hamidun
duas.translation: We return, we repent, we worship, and we praise our Lord

duas.title: Dua for Entering a New City
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ بَارِكْ لَنَا فِيهَا
duas.transliteration: Allahumma barik lana fiha
duas.translation: O Allah, bless us in it
